sentence.Network_en: Approximately 70 % of class time is devoted to casework and experiential learning.
sentence.Network_cn: 大约70%的课时是研习案例和经验.

sentence.Network_en: No crime scenes, no active casework.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要到犯罪现场, 不要去调查案件.

sentence.Network_en: He kept up with the gruelling casework, particularly in a course called Human Organization and Behavior.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不断做好累人的社会工作, 尤其是涉及人类组织和行为这一课程.

entry.def: Casework is social work that involves actually dealing or working with the people who need help.

means.word_mean: 1. close sociological study of a maladjusted person or family for diagnosis and treatment
